message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I know you'll love. I'm asking for $14,500 for it.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm only able to pay up to $12,000 for it. Would you consider meeting me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low.  How about we split the difference and do $13,250? That's still a great deal for a product worth $15,000 to me. Let's get this done!
Alice, I appreciate your response. I'm still not able to meet at $13,250. Could we perhaps agree on $13,000?
